name: @ljoukov/llm
description: Unified wrapper over OpenAI Responses API and Google Gemini (@google/genai), with streaming + usage/cost metrics.
author: Liudmila Joukovskaya

scripts.format: biome format --write src test biome.json tsup.config.ts vitest.unit.config.ts vitest.integration.config.ts
scripts.format:check: biome format src test biome.json tsup.config.ts vitest.unit.config.ts vitest.integration.config.ts
scripts.lint: biome lint src test tsup.config.ts vitest.unit.config.ts vitest.integration.config.ts
scripts.lint:fix: biome lint --write src test tsup.config.ts vitest.unit.config.ts vitest.integration.config.ts
scripts.verify: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test:unit && npm run build
